channel.title: Pvp notification! help m3h!
channel.description: ok how do you change the little thing in the bottom corner that notifies you if your in a pvp area or not. if you can, tell me how to change the text, and the color of it when you go from a safe zone to a pvp zone. thanks guys. oh btw im using phonescape source.
